SEARCH:
Package controller

Klasse AllPatientController

java.lang.Object
controller.AllPatientController
public class AllPatientController extends Object
The AllPatientController contains the entire logic of the patient view. It determines which data is displayed and how to react to events.

  • Methodendetails

    • initialize

      public void initialize(Login user)
      Initializes the corresponding fields. Is called as soon as the corresponding FXML file is to be displayed.
      Parameter:
      user - The currently logged-in user.

    • handleOnEditFirstname

      public void handleOnEditFirstname(TableColumn.CellEditEvent<Patient,String> event)
      Handles new firstname value.
      Parameter:
      event - Event including the value that a user entered into the cell.

    • doUpdate

      private void doUpdate(TableColumn.CellEditEvent<Patient,String> t)
      Updates a patient by calling the update-Method in the PatientDAO.
      Parameter:
      t - Row to be updated by the user (includes the patient).

    • readAllAndDeleteOldEntries

      public void readAllAndDeleteOldEntries()
      Reads all patients and deletes old entries.

    • readAllAndShowInTableView

      private void readAllAndShowInTableView()
      Calls readAll in PatientDAO and shows patients in the table.

    • handleDeleteRow

      public void handleDeleteRow()
      Handles a delete-click-event and archives the selected Patient and corresponding Treatments.

    • delete

      private void delete(Patient patient) throws SQLException
      Handles a delete-click-event. Calls the delete methods in the PatientDAO and TreatmentDAO.
      Parameter:
      patient - The patient to be deleted.
      Löst aus:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs.

    • handleAdd

      public void handleAdd()
      Handles an add-click-event. Creates a patient and calls the create method in the PatientDAO.

    • checkTextfields

      private boolean checkTextfields()
      Checks if all textfields are filled.
      Gibt zurück:
      True if all textfields are filled.

    • clearTextfields

      private void clearTextfields()
      Removes content from all textfields.
